ArabFinance: Schneider Electric and AVEVA have agreed to combine technological solutions to help the mining industry, to drive digital transformation and sustainability, Daily News reported on July 25th.

The deal will see technology offerings combined to support sustainability initiatives at mining companies.

Both companies will provide the tools organizations need to make more strategic choices, based on sound advice focused on sustainability.

AVEVA and Schneider Electric also recently sponsored an IDC Technology Spotlight, titled "Transitioning to Sustainable Mining, Minerals and Metals Practices".

IDC Technology Spotlight research also confirms that the sector continues to face criticism and pressure for not taking the lead in sustainability previously. However, platforms that include additional analytics capabilities allow for improved operational efficiencies while enhancing visibility into ongoing changes.
